titleStmt.title: The arte of rhetorique for the vse of all suche as are studious of eloquence, sette forth in English, by Thomas Wilson.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Thomas, 1525?-1581.
Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536. Matrimonii encomium. English.

notesStmt.note: Includes "An epistle to perswade a young ientleman to mariage, deuised by Erasmus", F1v-I2v, a translation of "Matrimonii encomium" (not the same as that in STC 10492).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
